function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Biometric surveillance measures (e.g., face recognition, GPS tracking) creating privacy concerns","Impact":"Increased concern about privacy invasion and potential pushback from consumers","Mitigation":"Transparent communication about the purpose and use of biometric surveillance measures, obtaining consent, and implementing strict data protection measures","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving biometric recognition, encryption, data anonymization","People":"Consumers, privacy advocates","Owner":"Retailers, technology providers"},{"Description":"Health screening measures may be perceived as invading personal privacy","Impact":"Potential resistance and discomfort from shoppers, leading to decreased foot traffic and negative public perception","Mitigation":"Transparent communication about the purpose of health screening, obtaining consent, and implementing strict data protection measures","Technologies":"Non-invasive temperature scanners, anonymized data collection, encryption","People":"Shoppers, public health advocates","Owner":"Retailers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of physical servicescape changes on customer experience (CX) due to pandemic challenges","Impact":"Negative impact on customer experience, leading to decreased satisfaction and loyalty","Mitigation":"Adaptation of layout and design to ensure safety while maintaining a pleasant environment, effective signage and communication, and control of ambient conditions to reduce discomfort","Technologies":"Digital signage, crowd monitoring technology, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Customers, employees","Owner":"Retailers, facility managers"}]}
